summary: An ordinance granting to J. L. Pidgeon et al, the right, privilege and authority to improve the south side of Calhoun Street and the north side of East McGraw Street, each from 25th Avenue North to 26th Avenue North; and the east side of 25th Avenue North and the west side of 26th Avenue North, each from East McGraw Street to Calhoun Street; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon at their own cost and expense.
